name: Real Driving 2
description:
Ever desire to play the most realistic racing car simulator?

Along with Real Driving 2, we're ready to surprise you with loads of cool realistic cars.
Now you can drive, drift and customize a racing sports car for free! Fasten your seatbelt, here is a life-like vehicle simulator game for you！

Get behind the wheel and start your lessons in the most realistic city driving simulator around! This is a game that will not only test your skills in controlling the car but also demand full attention to traffic rules.

Experience realistic car driving in the new racing simulation game, surpassing other race vehicles.

With its advanced realistic physics engine, this ultimate car game - Real Driving 2 : Ultimate Car Simulator is going to provide you with addictive gameplay, and endless fun of driving simulation!

The tutorial will teach you all the ruls on how to drive and race your customized cars on challenging maps, finish multiple missions!

KEY FEATURES

▶ Beautiful 3D modern graphics,extremely high-quality visuals.
▶Powered by the remarkable UE4 Engine, features detailed car damage, fully functional rearview mirrors, and dynamic reflections for truly HD racing.
▶ Exciting level modes, endless mode, nitrogen mode, drift, time trials, etc!
▶ Controls: Buttons, Wheel, Tilt, etc.
▶ Multiple dynamic HD camera angles, including first person camera and third person camera.
▶ Various racing scenarios, weather system, and racing tracks to choose from, miles of roads to drive on.
▶ Realistic driving simulator system, accurate simulation of real car driving experience.
▶ Authentic car accident, and car damage physics effects.
▶ Unfettered customization: Customize your cars with paint, fittings, components.
▶ The Coolest and Various car collection and Authentic and Real sports car.

Pick your own classic, modern or luxury car, drive in cockpit view through the endless traffic and realistic environment. Become a furious racer, hurtle on city, country, wherever you want! Overtake traffics to earn coins as much as possible, and unlock more brand new fancy cars!

Get your car ready and start your engine! With the amazing real-like racing car simulator, feel free to immerse yourself in the pleasant of speeding!

Download Real Driving 2 for FREE to show your driving skill now! Trample the accelerator and speed up!
